definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose

sentences.english: Sherbet lemons are hard candies filled with dry sherbet powder.
sentences.chinese: 柠檬果子露其实就是中心填了这种干果子露粉的硬糖。

sentences.english: Sherbet lemons are hard candies filled with dry sherbet powder.
sentences.chinese: 柠檬果子露其实就是中心填了这种干果子露粉的硬糖。

sentences.english: Sherbet is made with fruits and ice.
sentences.chinese: 冰冻果子露是用水果和冰做的。

sentences.english: Do you have ice cream or sherbet ?
sentences.chinese: 有冰激凌或者冰冻果子露吗？

sentences.english: Vodka and sherbet can be mixed together to create a delicious punch.
sentences.chinese: 伏特加和果子露可以混合在一起，创造一种美味冲床。

sentences.english: And then afterward going to get sherbet. I like to keep things light and fun!
sentences.chinese: 但我想我应该会去搭缆车，随后吃冰冻果子露。

sentences.english: For dessert we have vanilla ice cream and lemon sherbet.
sentences.chinese: 我们餐后甜点有香草冰淇淋和柠檬果子露。

sentences.english: The guests were drinking coffee, lemonade, or sherbet .
sentences.chinese: 客人们正在喝咖啡，柠檬水或冰冻果子露。

definition: orange juice/CL:瓶[ping2],杯[bei1],罐[guan4],盒[he2]/see also 橙汁[cheng2 zhi1]
food preserved in sugar or honey
Baileys Irish Cream (brand of alcoholic drink)
Baileys Irish Cream (brand of alcoholic drink)/see also 百利甜酒[Bai3 li4 Tian2 jiu3]
